content: this is the pattern for a dinosaur appliqué **i do have this pattern available for free on my website if you would prefer that option the link is down below but i ve made it available for people to download as well for $1 on ravelry ** there is also a video tutorial for the pattern available on my youtube channel at crochet dinosaur appliqué tutorial 1 i ve used 4 ply cotton and a 1 25mm crochet hook but you can use different sizes depending on what you re most comfortable with * i used green light green black and white 4 ply crochet cotton * a crochet hook i used a 1 25mm hook * scissors * thread to sew the eye and legs on the dinosaur * white thread to embroider a dot on the eye * sewing needle * darning needle to weave in ends 1 https //youtu be/hqu3cpwrsi8
